parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.51

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the "heat" state of different vehicle parts for Thermal Imaging detection. This allows simulation of heated up parts of a vehicle without it actually having to utilize them - on a range from 0 to 1, 0 being cold, 1 being hot.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> This command does not work on infantry weapons.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle [[setVehicleTIPars]] [engine, wheels, weapon]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - Vehicle whose components are manipulated

</value></part><part><name>p2 </name>=<value> [engine, wheels, weapon]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> engine: [[Number]] - engine and body's heat

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> wheels: [[Number]] - tracks/wheels' heat

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> weapon: [[Number]] - main weapon's heat

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[setVehicleTIPars]] [1, 1, 1];			<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>set all parts hot</value></part></template>
[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[setVehicleTIPars]] [0, 0, 0];			<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>set all parts cold</value></part></template>
[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[setVehicleTIPars]] [0.5, 0.5, 0.5];	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>set all parts warm</value></part></template>
</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[setVehicleTIPars]] [1, 0, 0]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>set the engine warm, perfect for winter</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[disableTIEquipment]], [[setCamUseTI]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
